[DQC.IFRS.0101.9536] The concept ifrs-full:CashAdvancesAndLoansFromRelatedParties appears in the investing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:CashAdvancesAndLoansFromRelatedParties is a financing item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from financing activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
